content: I'd suggest modifying the difficulty to "medium". The puzzle requires the solver to first map the maze (cells + neigbors) which is easy and then move Pika following a wall. The wall-following part seems easy-medium to me so the whole may be medium :)

I'm ok with the change. Just do it.

Hmmm...changing difficulty level is not taking immediate effect. May have to wait for another system syn to see the change.
